properties.description: Mapping columns with if/then logic and categorization

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		client_name as string,
		engagement_title as string,
		sfdc_opp_num as string,
		platform as string,
		onsite_location as string,
		signed_famsa as string,
		existing_customer as string,
		products as string,
		cloud_ops_customer as string,
		cloud_platform as string,
		desired_start_date as string,
		desired_end_date as string,
		proposal_link as string,
		second_doc_link as string,
		loe_created_by as string,
		loe_created_date as string,
		pricing_basis as string,
		project_details as string,
		desired_duration as string,
		loe_duration_weeks as string,
		project_summary_consider_account_background_location_resourcing_key_dates_etc as string,
		{__index_level_0__} as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> loerawtransform
loerawtransform select(mapColumn(
		client_name,
		engagement_title,
		sfdc_opp_num,
		platform,
		signed_famsa,
		existing_customer,
		cloud_ops_customer,
		cloud_platform,
		desired_start_date,
		desired_end_date,
		loe_created_by,
		loe_created_date,
		pricing_basis,
		project_details,
		desired_duration,
		project_summary_consider_account_background_location_resourcing_key_dates_etc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(sfdc_opp_num = iif(length(sfdc_opp_num)<= 6, toInteger(sfdc_opp_num), 9999)) ~> castingdtypes
